exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a n H. unfold LindenbaumConstruction, LindenbaumChain. split. - intros [m HM]. exists (S m). right. split. + apply HM. + apply H. - intros [m [HM | [HCA HP]]]. + exists m. left. apply HM. + exists n. right. split. * apply HCA. * apply HP.
